rows.label: qev050601_MSG0001
rows.name: We march upon Cauldros to smite our long-sworn foe![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0002
rows.name:
You! Human! You are the vaunted warrior who bested
even the blade of our own prince, yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0003
rows.name:
Your people and mine are joined by blood oath.
Will you do us the great honor of joining in this fight?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_JNK0010
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev050601_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Ni Zinga what they are planning to do.

rows.label: qev050601_JNK0020
rows.name: Guess

rows.label: qev050601_SEL0021
rows.name:
Ask Ni Zinga if they're off to
pick a fight with the Ganglion.

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0004
rows.name:
After first landing on this planet, many of my fellow
Wrothians were devoured by the vile queen jacul.
We go now to slit her belly and retrieve their bones.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0005
rows.name:
The time will come when they pay for sullying the
honor of the Wrothians. But today is not that day.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0006
rows.name:
After first landing on this planet, many of my kind were
devoured by the vile beast known as the queen jacul.
But today, she is our prey![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0007
rows.name:
By custom, vengeance should be claimed by Wrothian
hands alone...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0008
rows.name:
But time and wear have dulled our weapons and
shattered our Skells, and those with the skill to repair
them met their end in the foul queen's maw.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0009
rows.name:
To go alone would be to die with vengeance unwon.
And so it is that I swallow my pride and beg your
assistance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0010
rows.name:
Will you march with us to still the breath of the putrid
queen jacul forever?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_JNK0210
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: qev050601_SEL0211
rows.name: Say that you're busy at the moment.

rows.label: qev050601_JNK0220
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev050601_SEL0221
rows.name: Nod grimly.

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0064
rows.name:
I see. But I fear that without your strength,
this battle is lost before it begins.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0065
rows.name:
If ever you find time to help, I humbly ask that you
come speak with me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0011
rows.name: We will not forget this debt. Now let the hunt begin![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0012
rows.name:
Ah, look! The Three Talons! Excellent timing.
This fine human will join our hunt, my friends.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0013
rows.name:
General, this is a matter for Wrothian hands alone.
We need enlist no help from outsiders.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0014
rows.name:
Well said, brother. We will avenge our father ourselves.
We have trained long and hard for that very purpose![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0015
rows.name:
No foe can stand against the combined might of
Da Naguth the Cutting Wind, Da Girhi
the Thundercrash, and Da Zeulbe the Boulder-Smasher![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0016
rows.name:
My siblings and I require no further assistance,
least of all from a scrawny outsider![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_JNK0030
rows.name: Challenge

rows.label: qev050601_SEL0031
rows.name: Say you're tougher than the Three Talons combined.

rows.label: qev050601_JNK0040
rows.name: Downplay

rows.label: qev050601_SEL0041
rows.name:
Admit that you're no Wrothian,
but you'll do your best.

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0017
rows.name:
Keh! A bold boast! But I shall need proof that your
bravery is not mere talk.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0018
rows.name: It seems our guest is aware of [ST:gender p1=his p2=her ] limitations, at least.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0019
rows.name:
But the foe we face is deadly. An ally without absolute
confidence in [ST:gender p1=his p2=her ] abilities is naught but a liability.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0020
rows.name:
I will hear no squabbling! I know and respect the
strength of the Three Talons, but I will not have you
die needlessly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0021
rows.name:
May we spar with this warrior you have found before
marching on the queen jacul, then?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0022
rows.name:
Knowing an ally's strength is paramount when trusting
them with one's back in battle.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0023
rows.name:
If we decide [ST:gender p1=he p2=she ] is more liability than asset,
then I must insist that [ST:gender p1=he p2=she ] stays behind.
It would not do to lead an ally into certain death.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0024
rows.name:
No doubt you wish to know the caliber of those you
will be fighting with as well, friend?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_JNK0050
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev050601_SEL0051
rows.name: Nod and say that it crossed your mind.

rows.label: qev050601_JNK0060
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev050601_SEL0061
rows.name: Admit that you aren't particularly interested.

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0025
rows.name:
And rightly so! Then we shall
await you atop Stickstone Rise.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0026
rows.name:
We shall endeavor to do you no lasting harm,
but I advise you to come prepared just the same.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0027
rows.name:
Then you think our strength to be irrelevant?
Or perhaps you plan to perform this hunt alone?
Brave words, human.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0028
rows.name:
Then meet us atop Stickstone Rise! We shall do our
best to respond to your valor in kind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0029
rows.name:
Both of their parents were killed by the queen jacul.
No doubt they wish to avenge that loss themselves.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0030
rows.name:
But I am in command of this operation, and will not
allow them to die in vain. This is why I have gathered
help such as yours.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0031
rows.name:
I ask that you go and defeat the Three Talons,
that the siblings may learn the limits of their strength.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0032
rows.name:
Ha ha! The Three Talons came and asked for the
honor of joining you in this hunt, just as I anticipated.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0033
rows.name:
Though I am surprised by just how emphatic
Da Naguth was, for he is not quick to
acknowledge others. You must truly be a rare talent.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_JNK0070
rows.name: Boast

rows.label: qev050601_SEL0071
rows.name: Claim that you're the strongest BLADE on Mira.

rows.label: qev050601_JNK0080
rows.name: Shrug

rows.label: qev050601_SEL0081
rows.name: Humbly say that you're just an average BLADE.

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0034
rows.name:
Ha ha ha! It seems that I have invited a legend into our
midst without realizing it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0035
rows.name:
Modesty well befits a warrior. And yet, an imposing
aura pours forth from you. You cannot hide it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0036
rows.name:
With the combined might of you and the Three Talons,
even the queen jacul is nothing to fear.
Now, let us begin the briefing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0037
rows.name:
Our quarry rarely alights on the ground. To lure her
down, we must first slay her minions around Cauldros.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0038
rows.name:
To do this, we will need to cover considerable ground.
You and the Talons will each split up and defeat the
minions in your own area.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0039
rows.name:
Once the queen shows herself, the first to sight her will
hail the others to that location. When you regroup,
you will unite and take her down![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0040
rows.name: Hmm... A rather loose plan, is it not?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0041
rows.name:
Have we no word on her weaknesses?
All we have ever seen is her flying away while
covered in the blood of our fellows.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0042
rows.name:
Beyond that, we have no idea what manner of foe we
face.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0043
rows.name:
She seems to share the same nature as her minions.
[ST:playername ], you have faced their kind
before, have you not?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0044
rows.name:
You are alone in that.
Might you share your experience with us?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_JNK0090
rows.name: Suggest Physical[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_SEL0091
rows.name: Say that jaculs are weak to physical damage.

rows.label: qev050601_JNK0100
rows.name: Suggest Flame[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_SEL0101
rows.name: Say that jaculs are weak to fire.

rows.label: qev050601_JNK0110
rows.name: Suggest Lightning[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_SEL0111
rows.name: Say that jaculs are weak to electricity.

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0045
rows.name:
Hmm, I see. And what manner of attacks should we be
on the lookout for?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_JNK0120
rows.name: Warn of Gravity[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_SEL0121
rows.name:
Tell the Wrothians to watch out
for powerful gravity attacks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_JNK0130
rows.name: Warn of Lasers[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_SEL0131
rows.name: Explain that jaculs shoot lasers from their horns.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_JNK0140
rows.name: Warn of Charging[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_SEL0141
rows.name: Claim that the birds use their horns to charge.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0046
rows.name: You observed your opponent well in such a short time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0047
rows.name:
That gives us more than enough to go on.
Leave the rear guard to me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0048
rows.name: Very well. We shall depart for Cauldros now, General.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0049
rows.name:
Let us smoke out this vile queen and defeat her as one,
[ST:playername ]![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0050
rows.name:
It is time. Aid the Three Talons and smite this evil that
has taken so many Wrothian lives. May victory be
yours![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0051
rows.name:
That was a black day. Those of us left at the base
were unable to give it so much as a scratch.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0052
rows.name:
Please be carefulâ€”they are far stronger quarry than
your average indigens. They are, in truth, as demons,
born only to kill and devour men.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0053
rows.name:
You have returned alive! ...And your quarry?
Is the queen jacul dead?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0054
rows.name:
Excellent! Then you and the Three Talons brought her
to bay and delivered final justice![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0055
rows.name:
Thank you, my friend. Many fallen Wrothians will now
know peace. Please accept this in payment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0056
rows.name:
Mmm. In the days to come, I aim to train the Three
Talons into true masters. They are as sons and
daughter to me, and I will raise them with pride.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0057
rows.name:
In time, they will join me in destroying our tormentors,
the Ganglion. I hope that you shall fight at our side on
that glorious day![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0058
rows.name:
You have returned alive! ...And your quarry?
Is the queen jacul dead?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0059
rows.name:
...What? The beast is slain, but she killed all three of
the Talons? O blackest of days![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0060
rows.name:
Still, they were warriors all and knew the risks.
At least they can rest well knowing that their slayer
met grim justice.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0061
rows.name:
Thank you, my friend. This victory is your doing.
Please accept this reward.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0062
rows.name:
I lost my own son to that monster. He was their age,
and I had come to see the Talons like my own children
in the days since.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050601_MSG0063
rows.name:
The least I can do now is mourn them as sons and
daughter. I will see that they are properly laid to rest.[ST:wait ]
